main event: An object was observed at Wright-Patterson AFB, Ohio, on 5 Oct 60, appearing illuminated with a revolving motion and disappearing into the night sky after 15 minutes of observation.
interesting points: The object was described as having its trailing cut off and glowed in the night sky., The stars were reported to be yellow in color during the sighting., No sound was heard from the object., The object was possibly illuminated in a dim environment., The conclusions drawn indicated insufficient data for full evaluation.
sighted object: illuminated object with a revolving motion
witness description: The information does not specify the identity or number of witnesses.
